title: Boris Johnson – 2022 Press Conference With President Zelenskyy in Kyiv
author: admin
summary: The text of the press conference between Boris Johnson, the Prime Minister, and Volodymr Zelenskyy, the President of Ukraine, in Kyiv on 24 August 2022.
content:
